page.title: 03INTRODUCTION (P3)
page.content: One event which has been held in Deeply Vale for 8 years has been a pop festival. This has attracted up to 20,000 people. The festival is held duing the summer so that the people who come to it can camp in this scenic area. Like many pop festivals many of the local residents object to it taking place. Around Ashworth Reservoir are many abandoned stone quarries. Some have become filled with water. The area around them is boggy. Many of the buildings in the area are occupied by quite wealthy commuters from the surrounding towns and old people.
